name: Hamtaro: Ham-Hams Unite!
description:
Unite the Ham-hams & unlock Boss's secret!
Boss sets Hamtaro on a quest to bring back all of the Ham-Hams for a surprise he has at the Clubhouse. Along the way, Hamtaro needs to learn Ham-chat in order to further progress in the game. There are 86 ham-chat words in all and 6 locations to explore.
